1.query:
timeseries workqueue_depth = sum(workqueue_depth), by: { controller }
| sort arraySum(workqueue_depth) desc
1.title: Work Queue Depth

10.content:
#### Redis Status

Displays Redis metrics such as request activities and request performance that are vital for maintaining the performance of ArgoCD’s internal state management.

---

11.title: Git Repositories

12.content:
#### ArgoCD Controller Stats

It tracks controller performance metrics such as work queue depth, reconciliation lag, and error rates, offering insights into the control plane's responsiveness and stability.

---

13.title: Applications

17.content:
#### Share feedback 
We welcome your feedback on this dashboard to help us improve and deliver a more effective observability solution, ensuring it provides maximum value to your software development lifecycle and delivery processes. Please post a comment here: [Feedback channel for CI/CD Pipeline Observability](https://community.dynatrace.com/t5/Platform-Engineering/Feedback-channel-for-CI-CD-Pipeline-Observability/m-p/269193/highlight/true#M1) (Dynatrace Community).
#
---

#### About this dashboard

Release v0.5.0, [Origin](https://github.com/Dynatrace/dynatrace-configuration-as-code-samples)

18.content:
### ArgoCD Instance/Infrastructure Health

This dashboard provides a comprehensive, real-time overview of ArgoCD's operational health and performance. Designed to support platform engineers and DevOps teams, it consolidates critical telemetry from multiple components of the ArgoCD ecosystem to enhance visibility, troubleshooting, and optimization.

By aggregating these metrics into a single pane of glass, the dashboard empowers teams to proactively manage their GitOps infrastructure, quickly identify bottlenecks, and maintain high availability and performance of their continuous delivery pipelines.

19.title: Application Health Status

24.title: Sync Status

3.query:
timeseries argocd_redis_request_total = sum(argocd_redis_request_total), by: { failed }
| fieldsAdd state= if(failed == "true","failed", else: "success")
| sort arraySum(argocd_redis_request_total) desc
| limit 20
3.title: Redis Request Activities

4.query:
timeseries argocd_kubectl_exec_pending = sum(argocd_kubectl_exec_pending), by: { command }
| sort arrayAvg(argocd_kubectl_exec_pending) desc
4.title: Number of pending kubectl Executions

7.query:
timeseries argocd_git_request_total = sum(argocd_git_request_total), by: { repo }
| sort arraySum(argocd_git_request_total) desc
7.title: Git Request Activities by Repository

9.content:
#### Repo Server Stats

Monitors repository server health, including Git fetch times and request throughput, ensuring efficient and reliable access to configuration sources.

---
